title: Dolly Parton Announces Open Casting Call To Play Her In Broadway Musical

excerpt: With 'Dolly: An Original Musical' headed to Broadway, Dolly Parton is looking to make someone's dream come true with an open casting call.
text: Dolly Parton is looking to give someone their big break as she casts the upcoming Broadway musical about her life. html:
Dolly Parton is looking to give someone their big break as she casts the upcoming Broadway musical about her life.

The 11x Grammy winner announced an open casting call for Dolly: An Original Musical â€” for which she is writing the music, co-writing the book and serving as a producer â€” including for the titular role of Parton at all ages to portray her â€œat different stages of her incredible lifeâ€

â€œI want to give you the chance to help me bring my story to Broadway â€” and maybe even play me!â€ said Parton in a YouTube video.

Watch on Deadline

â€œThis show is a celebration of my music, my life and all the amazing people whoâ€™ve been with me along the way,â€ she added. â€œNow, weâ€™re looking for talented performers who can capture the spirit of my journey, whether youâ€™re an experienced theater professional or an undiscovered gem with that little special something.â€

A few finalists will be selected to audition in-person for the casting director. She directed fans to DollyMusical.com to submit their audition, also encouraging them to post it online with the hashtag #SearchForDolly â€œso I donâ€™t miss â€™em.â€

Originally titled Hello, Iâ€™m Dolly after her 1967 debut album, Parton announced the musical in June on stage at CMA Fest in Nashville, partnering with ATG Productions. Sheâ€™s co-writing the book with Maria S. Schlatter, and Bartlett Sher has since been tapped to direct.

Youâ€™ll laugh, youâ€™ll cry, youâ€™ll clap, youâ€™ll stomp, it truly is a Grand Olâ€™ Opera. Pun and fun intended. Donâ€™t miss it!â€
